about_the_game:
A mysterious shadow looms in the sky, threatening the Na’vi clans below who are celebrating at their great festival of games. Face the RDA and protect the unity of the clans.  
  
Continue your Na’vi journey and stop The Sky Breaker:
- Travel with the zakru to majestic new areas of the Upper Plains.
- Compete in the traditional Great Games of the Na’vi.
- Confront a dark shadow from the past.
- Unite the resistance to save your allies.

Upgrade to the Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora™ Season Pass to get access to two story packs including The Sky Breaker and Secrets of the Spires, as well as a bonus quest and cosmetics.
